title: New: Talos – Tethered Bones
content:
I’ve been waiting for this track to appear online for what feels like forever.

Since hearing it at some point during last year, I’ve been itching to be able to post it, and as luck would have it, it became public during the busiest two weeks of the year. Damn. Anyway, Talos need little introduction; the project of Eoin French (Hush War Cry) featuring production from Ian Ring (Young Wonder), their debut track, Tethered Bones is slides in somewhere between James Blake and SOHN. Four minutes and twenty seconds of absolute bliss. This is one of the tracks of the year.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
